scripts.start: npm install && npm run build-custom && concurrently --kill-others "NODE_ENV=production npm run start-server"
scripts.start-dev: npm install && npm run build-custom && concurrently --kill-others "NODE_ENV=development npm run start-server"
scripts.start-hot: npm run restore-public && npm run prepare-hot-public-folder && react-scripts start
scripts.build-custom: npm run restore-public && react-scripts build && node src/build-scripts/build-custom.js
